= Character Replacement Passthrough Attributes

These attributes should produce raw HTML characters that bypass escaping.

== HTML Tags

Line break: {lt}br{gt}

Strong: {lt}strong{gt}bold{lt}/strong{gt}

== Comparison Operators

Less than: 5 {lt} 10

Greater than: 10 {gt} 5

== Ampersand

Ampersand alone: {amp}

Entity syntax: {amp}copy;

URL query: example.com?a=1{amp}b=2
